alert.note: Alert for North Snowy Range Foothills; Upper North Platte River Basin (Wyoming) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Cheyenne (Southeastern Wyoming and Western Nebraska)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued March 22 at 6:12PM MDT until March 23 at 12:00AM MDT by NWS Cheyenne
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL MIDNIGHT MDT TONIGHT... * WHAT...Snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 2 to 4 inches. Winds gusting as high as 60 MPH. * WHERE...North Snowy Range Foothills and Upper North Platte River Basin. * WHEN...Until Midnight Tonight. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. Blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

area.areaDesc: North Snowy Range Foothills; Upper North Platte River Basin
